name: Tinashe
description:
'''Tinashe Jorgensen Kachingwe''' ({{IPAc-en|t|iː|ˈ|n|ɑː|ʃ|eɪ|audio=LL-Q1860 (eng)-Flame, not lame-Tinashe.wav}} {{respell|tee|NAH|shay}}; born February 6, 1993) is an American singer, songwriter, dancer, and actress. Born in [[Lexington, Kentucky]], Tinashe moved to [[Pasadena, California]], as a child, where she pursued work in entertainment. Her roles include a motion-capture performance in the animated film ''[[The Polar Express (film)|The Polar Express]]'' (2004), Robin Wheeler in the [[Cartoon Network]] television series ''[[Out of Jimmy's Head]]'' (2007–2008), and a recurring role in the [[CBS]] series ''[[Two and a Half Men]]'' (2008–2009). From 2007 to 2011, she was a member of the girl group [[the Stunners]]. After they disbanded, Tinashe released her first musical projects, the mixtapes ''[[In Case We Die (Tinashe album)|In Case We Die]]'' (2012), ''[[Reverie (Tinashe album)|Reverie]]'' (2012) and ''[[Black Water (Tinashe album)|Black Water]]'' (2013).

Tinashe emerged into mainstream success with her 2014 [[major label]] debut single, "[[2 On]]" (featuring [[Schoolboy Q]]). The song peaked at number 24 on the [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]] and served as lead single for her debut studio album ''[[Aquarius (Tinashe album)|Aquarius]]'' (2014), which debuted at number 17 on the US ''Billboard'' 200. Her second and third studio albums, ''[[Nightride (album)|Nightride]]'' (2016) and ''[[Joyride (Tinashe album)|Joyride]]'' (2018), peaked at number 89 and 58 of the ''Billboard'' 200, respectively. Following her departure from RCA, Tinashe independently released four albums—''[[Songs for You]]'' (2019), ''[[333 (Tinashe album)|333]]'' (2021), ''[[BB/Ang3l]]'' (2023) and ''[[Quantum Baby]]'' (2024). The albums were received with critical acclaim. The lead single of Quantum Baby, "[[Nasty (Tinashe song)|Nasty]]", became a viral hit and was her first solo entry on the ''Billboard'' Hot 100. A remix of the album's single "[[No Broke Boys]]" with [[Disco Lines]] saw global commercial success, charting in numerous top 10s across the globe.
